name: Color Workload 1.0
description:
Color Workload

Made by The Creator

A game where you are a lowly employment seeker, you find an opportunity, but the test is harder than it seems!

Match the colors with your trusty "Ball buster 9000"

By pressing one of the four colored buttons, you will shoot the matching color

The more you match of the same colors the more you will score, watch out though, when you make a mistake, the score will go back to 0!

25 matching hits and over = 5 points each hit

50 matching hits and over = 10 points each hit

75 matching hits and over = 15 points each hit

100 matching hits and over = 25 points each hit

every 500 points reached the speed will increase

Controls:

up,down,left,right -- set the direction of your trusty "Ball buster 9000"

Q,W,A,S -- when pressed will shoot the matching color

Q - Red

W - Orange

A - Blue

S - Green

After 25 hits of the same color, the meter of the matching color will be full,

special attacks can be done afterwards that will destroy any matching colors of the color:

Hold "D", then press Q - For Special Red Attack

Hold "D", then press W - For Special Orange Attack

Hold "D", then press A - For Special Blue Attack

Hold "D", then press S - For Special Green Attack

"Space Bar" -- Total Annihilation Attack ( Shoots all of the colors of the filled meters )

ENTER - pause the game

E - speed up the line

I am planning new additions, will let you know when they will be available....

suggestions are always appreciated : )!!!

Oh and donations too :) !!!!
